Tree Friend of Harris Izael:
I have been waiting for You.
To destroy the Front, need to get rid of one of the following monsters: the Weeping Yui, The Enraged Wizard Kennen, The Magical Warrior Konyar, Sir The Darkness Resend, The Cowardly Muksu, Blind Hornaby, Jointoday Expectations.
So, are You ready to go to Fortune?
